docs.title: Welcome to Reynaldo José Gil García Personal Homepage
docs.text: Hi, I'm Reynaldo Gil! I'm a passionate Software Engineer with a strong background in Backend, Data and Machine Learning. Welcome to my personal website where you can learn more about my experience, projects, and thoughts on technology.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
• Estimate probability density of random variable: Python
  • ETLs related advertising: Scala, Spark
  • Streaming classifier with auto learning, Scala, Spark, Kafka
  • Http services about music metadata: Functional programming, Scala, Htt4s, Cats-eﬀect, FS2

docs.title: Skills
docs.text:
• Programming Languages: Python, Scala, Bash, AWK, Golang, Rust, Kotlin, C#
  • Libraries: Pydantic, Celery, AnyIO,Httpx, NumPy, Scipy, NLTK, Spacy, Apache Spark, Pandas, MPI
  • Machine Learning: PyTorch, HugginFace, Ollama, Llama
  • Cloud: AWS,S3, CloudWatch, ECR, EC2, EMR, GLUE, Lambda, Docker, Kubernetes, Serverless, Terraform, Pulumi, CloudFormation, AirFlow
  • Databases: MySQL, Postgres, Redshift, BigQuery, ElasticSearch, MongoDB, DynamoDB, RedShift, SnowFlake
  • Backend: FastAPI,Flask,Django, Http4s,Cats-Effect,FS2,PlayFramework, AkkaHTTP, Gin
  • Other: Git, GitHub, Gitlab, Jira, Slack, Zoom, JetBrains IDES
